price: ߡߐ߰ ߛߌ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߐ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߕߍ߫ ߣߵߊ߬ ߘߟߊ߫ ، ߏ߬ ߞߍߣߴߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߡߊ߬ ߝߍ߲ߝߍߘߍ߲߫ ߟߊߕߍ߰ߣߍ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَإِن مِّنكُمۡ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَاۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتۡمٗا مَّقۡضِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-in minkum illā wāriduhā kāna ʿalā rabbika ḥatman maqḍiyyan
